title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4109.4 - Claiming price
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4109.4 - Claiming price

State Regulations

The track shall pay the claiming price to the owner from
whom a horse is claimed when, and not until, all incidents of delivery of the
horse including all necessary instruments of ownership and registration, have
been executed by such owner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4109.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
